name: Antaria Online
description: Antaria Online is a Cross-Platform MMORPG being developed with community feedback.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
